mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_entity ( name, category_id, description, image_name, image_path ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{categoryId}, #{description}, #{imageName}, #{imagePath} )
mapper.select: SELECT product_entity.id, product_entity.name, product_entity.category_id, price_stock.quantity, price_stock.price, price_stock.stock, product_entity.image_name, product_entity.image_path FROM product_entity INNER JOIN price_stock ON product_entity.id = price_stock.product_id WHERE product_entity.deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY product_entity.category_id ASC, product_entity.id ASC
